events.1451: Buhlul Khan Lodi, an Afghan of Lodi tribe, marched down upon Delhi.
events.1910: Anant Laxman Kanhere, revolutionary, was hanged.
events.1950: Shyama Prasad Mukherji resigned. He was the first Minister of Central Cabinet.
events.1960: Meeting of Afro-Asian Conference at New Delhi.
events.1975: First Indian Satellite ''Aryabhata'' launched. The Satellite provided technological experience in building and operating a satellite system. It was launched by Russian launch vehicle Intercosmos.
events.1976: Indira Gandhi proposes a resumption of ties with Pakistan in New Delhi.
events.1993: Sanjay Dutt, film star, was held under TADA for possessing an AK-56 rifle.
events.1994: Rajindersing Sparo, first awardee of `Mahavir Chakra' and former Chief Minister of Punjab Major General, passed away.
events.1995: Rajendra Kumari Bajpai appointed the Lt. Governor of Pondichery.
events.1996: AIDS deleted from the list of contagious diseases in the Railway Act of 1989.
events.1997: I.K. Gujral, External Affairs Minister, chosen leader of United Front in place of Deve Gowda.
events.1998: Jayalalitha, AIADMK leader, demands that all ''tainted leaders'' be dropped by the Vajpayee Government or that  Sedapatti R. Muthiah be taken back.
